howToConvert.title: How to convert JPG to PNG files
howToConvert.description: We made our file converter to be as easy to use as possible. Converting your PNG to a JPG file involves three steps:

steps.description: Upload your JPG: Click upload to choose a file from your computer, or drag your file into the dropzone above.
Click ‘Convert to Word’: This converts your file from JPG to PNG.
Download your document: Your download will start automatically, or you can click to download your file.

whyConvert.title: Why convert JPG to PNG files
paragraphs: You may find a JPG to PNG converter useful when your photos' quality, transparency, and long-term preservation are paramount. While both are common image formats, PNGs are slightly more versatile and supported across various websites and platforms.
For increased accessibility and benefits for your PNGs, such as image transparency and smaller file sizes, convert your JPG to PNG files with our online file converter for free with Internxt.
